catalog_info.title: Master's Thesis Development and Writing
catalog_info.notes: REECA master's degree candidates are normally required to complete RSRA 298 (parts A and B) in the first year and RSRA 299 (parts A and B) in the second year of graduate study.
catalog_info.description: A continuation of RSRA 298 (parts A and B), culminating in the final master's thesis. Students must complete both parts of this course (parts A and B) within the same academic year in order to receive credit.
catalog_info.department: Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia
catalog_info.course_group: Russia, Eastern Europe, and Central Asia
